abstract: The markets gyrated throughout the day, with late selling pushing the Dow down 189 points.
snippet: The markets gyrated throughout the day, with late selling pushing the Dow down 189 points.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street could not hold onto its gains on Wednesday, as a 150-point rally vanished in the closing minutes of trading amid the continued uncertainty about the global financial system.

headline.main: For Dow, Final Swing Was Down
headline.print_headline: At the End of the Day, a Jittery Wall Street More Than Gives Back Its Gains

byline.original: By Michael M. Grynbaum and Keith Bradsher
